Text:
I have deside to not upload more from sites im not got any coment for the upload because i dont have the speed :-) If nowone wants torrent from the site i upload i cant understand i have to do it :-) Cheerz 

I mean all of the sites not only WA From Kink.com
merzedes your stuff is great I hope you change your mind

Hey Merzedes. Just want to clarify: will you keep uploading from Kink as long as people keep commenting? :)

(thanks for this one by the way!)
Thanks and hope to see more uploads from kink:D
I will  keep uploading from all of Kink as long as people keep commenting . But i will not upload from the sites i`m not getting any comment from :-) So it`s up to you out there   Cheerz
Thanks a lot, Merzedes! You're the great!

Sample, yesterday i upload a movie from FM and i haven`t got any coment for that movie, if i dont got any i will not upload more from FM-Kink.com  :-) i hope all of you understand what i mean :-)  Cheerz
Thanks for everything, you are truly awesome. We'll all have to show our appreciation better with more comments because youre stuff is great!

Hey merzedes! I will make an effort in the future to leave a comment for those torrents I like.

Your posts are appreciated!

Ok, i'll bite - as i've stated before, i appreciate your work very much. My favourite sites are TTOO, FM, DB, HT, WA, WP, MIP, CM, PD, CB(dunno if it still produces vids) - basically most of Kink and a bit of others. As far as appreciation goes, dropping a line is fine by me (or adding a quality point) - yet for a more precise form of measuring how well received a torrent is, you might try checking how many people keep seeding after a period of time. For instance, i loved HT-5225 with Devaun and kept seeding it for approximately three months.
